mapper.select:
select
distinct
from zj_dwzpdjb
order by ${orderByClause}
SELECT bio_id bioId,bio_name bioName,bio_bua_address bioAddress,LXRSJ tel,DJSJ date FROM bio LEFT JOIN zj_dwzpdjb ON bio_id=DWBH WHERE IF(#{bioNo}='',bio_name LIKE '%${bioName}%',bio.bio_no=#{bioNo})

SELECT specialty.cd_id gzbh,specialty.cd_name zpgz FROM zj_dwzpdjb dwzpdjb LEFT JOIN zj_dwzpgzb dwzpgzb ON dwzpdjb.ZPBH=dwzpgzb.ZPBH LEFT JOIN cdl_specialty specialty ON dwzpgzb.ZPGZ=specialty.cd_id WHERE dwzpdjb.DWBH=#{bioId}

SELECT gzb.ZPGZBH zpgzbh,grgzb.QZGZBH qzgzbh FROM zj_dwzpdjb djb LEFT JOIN zj_dwzpgzb gzb ON djb.ZPBH=gzb.ZPBH LEFT JOIN zj_grqzgzb grgzb ON grgzb.GZ=gzb.ZPGZ LEFT JOIN zj_grqzdjb grdjb ON grdjb.bip_id=bip_id WHERE djb.DWBH=#{bioId} AND grdjb.bip_id=#{bipId} AND grgzb.GZ=#{gzbh}

SELECT bip.bip_id bipId,bio.bio_id bioId,bip.bip_citizenid bipSfz,bip.bip_name bipName,bip.bip_sex bipSex,bip.bip_age bipAge,cdg_educationallevel.cd_name xueLi,cdl_specialty.cd_name zygw, bio.bio_name bioName,bio.bio_no bioNo,(dwgzb.ZRS-dwgzb.CGRSN-dwgzb.CGRSNV) wcgrs,tjxxb.TJSJ tjsj,cdl_specialty.cd_name tjzy, (CASE tjxxb.TJXLX when "d" THEN "单位推荐" when "g" THEN "个人推荐" END) AS tjxlb, bio.bio_bua_address bioAddress, dwdjb.LXRSJ bioTel
FROM bip LEFT JOIN zj_grqzdjb djb ON djb.bip_id=bip.bip_id LEFT JOIN zj_grqzgzb gzb ON djb.qzbh=gzb.QZBH LEFT JOIN zj_tjxxhzb hzb ON hzb.QZGZBH=gzb.QZGZBH LEFT JOIN zj_dwzpgzb dwgzb ON dwgzb.ZPGZBH=hzb.ZPGZBH LEFT JOIN zj_d_gwlb gwlb ON GWLB.dmid=dwgzb.GWLB LEFT JOIN cdg_educationallevel ON cdg_educationallevel.cd_id=bip.bip_whcd LEFT JOIN cdl_specialty ON cdl_specialty.cd_id=gzb.GZ LEFT JOIN zj_tjxxb tjxxb ON tjxxb.QZGZBH=gzb.QZGZBH LEFT JOIN zj_dwzpdjb dwzpb ON dwzpb.ZPBH=dwgzb.ZPBH LEFT JOIN zj_dwzpdjb dwdjb ON dwdjb.ZPBH=dwgzb.ZPBH LEFT JOIN bio ON bio.bio_id=dwdjb.DWBH
WHERE bip.bip_sex=#{bipSex} AND bip.bip_hjxz=#{hjxz} AND bip_age>#{minAge} AND #{maxAge}>=bip_age AND bip.bip_rylb=#{rylb} AND gzb.GZ=#{gz} AND bip_whcd >=#{whcd2} AND "90">=#{whcd1} AND bio.bio_orgtype=#{orgtype} AND dwgzb.GWLB=#{gwlb} AND STR_TO_DATE(djb.DJSJ,"%Y-%m-%d")>=STR_TO_DATE(#{djsj1},"%Y-%m-%d") AND STR_TO_DATE(#{djsj2},"%Y-%m-%d")>=STR_TO_DATE(djb.DJSJ,"%Y-%m-%d") AND STR_TO_DATE(hzb.TJSJ,"%Y-%m-%d")>=STR_TO_DATE(#{tjsj1},"%Y-%m-%d") AND STR_TO_DATE(#{tjsj2},"%Y-%m-%d")>=STR_TO_DATE(hzb.TJSJ,"%Y-%m-%d") AND hzb.SFHZ=#{hzzt}
GROUP BY bip.bip_id
